title: T206's for sale AB Matty SOLD, Tolstoi Cobb SGC 40 SOLD
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: T206's for sale AB Matty SOLD, Tolstoi Cobb SGC 40 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I have a hard time with the SGC holders on my scanner, and the AB's come out really hot with the green ink.

I would like to recycle these two:

AB 350 Matty Dark SGC 40 $1500 SOLDDDDD
super sharp, surface wrinkle top center

Tolstoi Red Cobb SGC 40 dropped to $1050 SOLDDDD
top left corner is the issue, crease and wrinkle free


Paypal is prefered with the upcoming move, I don't want to leave checks in the mailbox, and I can ship Monday to get them out of the house.  Email is the best way to get me.

Thanks for looking,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

[URL="http://s588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/T206%20Backs%20Line%20Newest/?action=view&current=T206MattyBlackAB350Front.jpg"][IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/T206%20Backs%20Line%20Newest/T206MattyBlackAB350Front.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL="http://s588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/T206%20Backs%20Line%20Newest/?action=view&current=T206TolstoiCobbRedfront.jpg"][IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/T206%20Backs%20Line%20Newest/T206TolstoiCobbRedfront.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Thanks,
Bob
